thread.section_title: Hotel delle Nazioni - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Friendly Staff
thread.title_full: Friendly Staff - Review of Hotel delle Nazioni, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Katie F
title: Friendly Staff
text: Our party of 21 stayed here and the staff was great! We loved having the bar downstairs to enjoy a glass of vino before or after dinner. You couldn't pick a better location-The Trevi Fountain is usually so crowded so it was nice to be able to go early or late to get great pictures. The rooms were a little small but honestly we spent very little time in our room so it worked perfectly for two.
